successes.title: Tuscany: Expand the World of Viticulture
successes.description: Enhance, elevate, and expand Viticulture: The Strategic Game of Winemaking in this expansion pack from Stonemaier Games.

Pledges.description: TOAST - Be toasted on camera by the designers after the project ends. Add the toast to other reward levels for $1. Retailers: Choose this level and contact us for retail packages.

TUSCANY - 1 copy of the Tuscany expansion pack with all stretch goals. Free shipping & customs for the US, CA, UK, DE, CN, & TW; see shipping chart for other areas. Extra copies are $45. Retail MSRP: $70. Tuscany cannot be played w/o Viticulture.

PRIMA - 72 custom metal lira coins plus 1 copy of Tuscany with all stretch goals. Free shipping & customs for the US, CA, UK, DE, CN, & TW; see shipping chart for other areas. Extra copies are $59. Unavailable via traditional distribution. Tuscany cannot be played w/o Viticulture.

VITICULTURE & TUSCANY - 1 copy of Viticulture and 1 copy of Tuscany with all stretch goals (both games ship together). Free shipping & customs for the US, CA, UK, DE, CN, & TW; see shipping chart for other areas. Extra sets are $79.

COMPLETE COLLECTOR'S EDITION - 1 copy of Viticulture and 1 copy of Tuscany with all stretch goals and 72 custom metal lira coins, with both game boxes packed together in an individually numbered, wine crate-inspired cardboard big box (total value: $170). Free shipping & customs for the US, CA, UK, DE, CN, & TW; also see shipping chart. Extra sets are $99. Unavailable via traditional distribution.

IMMORTALE (male) - Custom art of your face will be featured on a visitor card in every copy of the game. Includes 1 copy of Tuscany Prima with all stretch goals (upgrade to the Complete Collector's Edition for an additional $40). Free shipping & customs for the US, CA, UK, DE, CN, & TW; see shipping chart for other areas.

IMMORTALE (female) - Custom art of your face will be featured on a visitor card in every copy of the game. Includes 1 copy of Tuscany Prima with all stretch goals (upgrade to the Complete Collector's Edition for an additional $40). Free shipping & customs for the US, CA, UK, DE, CN, & TW; see shipping chart for other areas.

RAPIDO - 1 copy of Tuscany Prima with all stretch goals (upgrade to the Complete Collector's Edition for an additional $40). The game will be signed by the designers and delivered 1-2 months early (these are the first copies off the press). Free worldwide shipping included.
